name: energy saving, from ventilation system, 6 x 120 m3/h, polyethylene ducts, with earth tube heat exchanger | energy saving | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/218/documentation

The module reflects the impact of the ventilation system in relation to the benefit. It can be used for comparison with other systems for heat production. The date bases on a operation of the ventilation system of 12 month per year.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Materials and energy used for ventilation of dwellings in relation to the heat demand reduction for a low energy building.
category: F:Construction/43:Specialized construction activities/432:Electrical, plumbing and other construction installation activities/4322:Plumbing, heat and air-conditioning installation

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data representative for a low energy building in Zurich, Switzerland
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Reduction of 34.2 MJ/(m2 a) heat demand representative for a low energy building in Zurich and a room temperature of 20°C. Heat demand of the building without ventilation system 105 MJ/(m2 a) according to SIA 380/1. Electricity demand of ventilator (0.4 Wh/m3) representative for DC- or EC-motors and a system design with low pressure drops. Electricity demand of control unit 10 W. Electricity mix for Switzerland used. Ventilation system including ground heat exchanger and 6 decentral ventilation units with an air exchange rate of 120 m3/h each. Distribution of fresh- and exhaust-air within the flat with polyethylene tubes (75 mm diameter).
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Calculations, technical information and assumptions. Data valid for example building used.

flow.name: energy saving
